'''Ian Lloyd Anderson''' is an Irish actor. He is best known for his role in the TV series ''Love/Hate'', where he co-starred with fellow ''Game of Thrones'' actor [[Aidan Gillen]].

In [[Season 5]] he will portray [[Derek]].<ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/season-five-casting-news-updates/]</ref>
